hibernate-mapping.query: select distinct pinger from PingerEntity as pinger left join fetch pinger.user where pinger.id = :id
select distinct pinger from PingerEntity as pinger left join fetch pinger.user where pinger.frequency = :frequency
from HttpStatisticsEntity as statistics where statistics.pinger = :pinger
from HttpStatisticsEntity as stat where stat.pinger = :pinger AND stat.timestamp >= :timestamp
